refsect1.title: GTK+ dependency
refsect1.para: Both GtkSourceView 3 and GtkSourceView 4 depend on GTK+ 3. GtkSourceView 5 depends on GTK+ 4. Before porting an application to GTK+ 4, it is therefore recommended to first port to GtkSourceView 4 and then to GTK+ 4 and GtkSourceView 5.

refsect1.title: Preparation in GtkSourceView 3
refsect1.para: GtkSourceView 3.24 is the latest stable GtkSourceView 3 version. You should use this version without using any deprecated API.

refsect1.title: New pkg-config name
refsect1.para: For GtkSourceView 4, the pkg-config name is: gtksourceview-4

refsect1.title: A set of intermediate tarballs to ease the transition
refsect1.para: When porting to GtkSourceView 4, instead of doing everything in one step, you can compile intermediate 3.99.x tarballs of GtkSourceView, so that you can compile your code regularly and run the tests. Not doing all at once in one big commit, but instead doing smaller and testable commits.

listitem.para: All the deprecated APIs have been removed.
Only the version 2 of the GtkSourceView language definition file format is supported (for *.lang files, used for syntax highlighting). The support for the version 1 has been dropped.
